name: .LF
summary: Learn about .LF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Typically, LF files are not meant to be opened or edited. Editing an LF file may invalidate your application license.
If you are a developer who wants to edit your LF files' XML schema, you can do so using SoftwareKey Protection PLUS, which is included in SoftwareKey System.
